name: Adobe Download Assistant Partial Download File
summary: Learn about .ADADOWNLOAD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The ".adadownload" file extension is added to the file being downloaded. When the download is complete, the file extension is removed.
NOTE: Adobe Download Assistant has been discontinued.

description: Partially downloaded file created by Adobe Download Assistant, a program that helps users download Adobe software products; saves the contents of a file (typically a software installer) as it's being downloaded by the program.
